description:
A versatile, everyday sweater featuring classic sweatshirt style details, the Nova Sweater Sweatshirt features their Cool-Lite™ fabric for total comfort with style. This lightweight and breathable merino wool blend manages moisture away from your body in cool conditions while naturally resisting odors. The relaxed fit and ribbed neck, cuffs and hem make for a reliable, comfy feel.

Inspired by nature, Icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics. Merino is an annually renewable fiber that naturally resists odors, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Icebreaker Nova Sweater Sweatshirt - Mens
